tweets.text: What @ClareDinnisEA doesn‚Äôt explain in her interviews is why @EnvAgency were so slow to react to the current crisis and that they increased the permitted waste tonnage to the landfill in Oct 2020 even though odour complaints were on the rise!Negligent! @ShaunLintern #stopthestink https://t.co/i7h920bJNu https://t.co/wPyRTkwcTz

@SimonTagg Yes @SimonTagg @ClareDinnisEA should make way for a director who has the balls to consider the environment the community are subjected to rather than treading fearfully around @RedIndustries2 in case they do a runner.  #justice #stopthestink

@StinkStopthe What is the point where it gets shut? How many complaints do there need to be? How many breaches? It seems like The EA are just an apologist mouth pieces for Red making piecemeal orders that don't actually have an impact on the quality of life of residents.

The @EnvAgency calculate that Affinity Water are over abstracting local chalk streams to the tune of about 430 million litres of water per day.

That's almost 10% of the world's total supply of chalk streams degraded for profit.

Let's talk about a clean conscience shall we. https://t.co/J8nQmVNWlv
@Tus_M_ @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgency @ShaunLintern They simply didn‚Äôt believe the community for a long time.  They thought we were just trying to annoy @RedIndustries2.

The Otter Estuary Restoration should be brilliant, but it is quickly becoming a disaster! Tree & vegetation cover removal from 4th May is appalling bad practice for nesting birds, regardless of dormice. Time to stop. @EnvAgency @kiergroup @Natures_Voice https://t.co/oTzDbjCBof
This is why we need to go higher than @EnvAgency ! Ineffective , inept & defensive of their own mistakes @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe #stopthestink #stillstinks https://t.co/PQFr5Vikjd

Instead of being sanctioned for tipping more than they were allowed on permit the @EnvAgency legalised it instead? And the authorities wonder why people question foul play? @MPGeorgeEustice @DefraGovUK Someone independent needs to lead this shameful mess @Cap_it_off #stopthestink https://t.co/GCaS8XOOY5

@Tus_M_ @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgency @ShaunLintern The increase in tonnage was authorised retrospectively as @RedIndustries2 had already started tipping more waste than their permitted tonnage. @EnvAgency did not properly investigate or listen to objection of Silverdale Parish Counci. @EnvAgency are complicit in all of this mess

tweets.text: Earlier this morning our field team were at a marina in #Goole helping to clear up some oil that had leaked into the water. The pads and bunds are used to contain and soak up the oil and prevent any damage to #wildlife in the nearby rivers. https://t.co/yep6FSvuk2

Aaaanybody fancy coming to measure the levels of gas in my home this afternoon? We had to escape last night and apparently it was shocking there so the house will be full of it! @NewsNBC @StinkStopthe @Cap_it_off @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids

Forgot or deliberately omitted @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgency @JamesBevanEA 
#stopthestink https://t.co/NfRGQ2Mjg1
@Cap_it_off @EnvAgencyMids @ClareDinnisEA @AaronBell4NUL Would look better for the EA if reports from May 1st were down so Well done EA for fooling nobody again.

I never had a fear of odours before but I‚Äôm certainly developing one this week, can‚Äôt bear another night of this @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe @EnvAgency @JamesBevanEA #stopthestink https://t.co/spzFlxeANK

tweets.text: Remember the dump people from The Walking Dead? That'll be Newcastle-under-Lyme soon, buried under Walleys Quarry @RedIndustries2 because @EnvAgency put wealth before health üí∏ #StopTheStink https://t.co/kScUfnsaOA

Cap it. Close it. Clean & restore it.This town will accept no less now @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA @EnvAgency @PHE_EoEngland 
Oh&the important matter of an independent enquiry into your regulation which has seen the issue spiral out of control @Cap_it_off #stopthestink https://t.co/erp0WcOi4Y

Gassed by @RedIndustries2 
Gaslighted by the @EnvAgency & @PHE_EoEngland 

We will stand as a community and fight you with everything we‚Äôve got. What you find is @RedIndustries2 that when you harm our children we have nothing to lose @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe #stopthestink https://t.co/E34PFX01VG

Time is up.
@StinkStopthe @Cap_it_off @EnvAgencyMids @EnvAgency https://t.co/32aD8T1a7f https://t.co/78XBuIhDWm

You can‚Äôt make this up. The email for reporting to the @EnvAgency has now ‚Äúbroken‚Äù so you need to call to report the stink. This is very convenient as most people have been told to email in; emails hold more sway in a court of law. @StinkStopthe @ClareDinnisEA what is happening?

domain.name: TV Shows
domain.description: Television shows from around the world

entity.name: Countryfile
entity.description: Stories are shared of the people, places and issues at the heart of the British countryside. Popular features include the programme's photography contest, which culminates in a yearly calendar sold to benefit charity, the Video Diary, produced by viewers and focused on life in rural areas, and the weather forecasts.

domain.name: TV Shows
domain.description: Television shows from around the world

entity.name: Countryfile Diaries
entity.description: A sister show to the BBC's `Countryfile' series, this rural affairs programme sees a team of presenters travel the length and breadth of the United Kingdom to cover stories related to the British countryside and the season of spring. As this period is a busy time of the year for the farming and outdoor communities in particular, regular topics covered include the production of food, nature conservation, and a look at a chosen area's culture and history. Stunning landscapes and a variety of wildlife also feature prominently.

tweets.text:
1/5 Really pleased to be out in #NewcastleunderLyme today with @EnvAgencyMids for a #CovidSafe visit to:
- see @RedIndustries2 progress at #WalleysQuarry
- hear from residents
- see our #airquality monitoring stations
- meet @AaronBell4NUL for an update
